div.l: And on an hors · the sak he caste anon
Furth goth Alaȳn and furth goth Iohn
With goode swerd · and bokeler be his side
Iohn knewe the wey · hym nedid no guyde
And at the Mille · the sak adoun̄ he laith
Alayn spak first · alhaile Symkyn in faith
How faris thi faire doughter · and thi wif
Alayn welcom quod Symkyn bi my lif
And Iohn Also how now · what do ye here
By god quod Iohn · Symond neode nas no pere
Hym behoves to ʆserve hym self · that has no swayn
Or ellis he is a fole as clerkis sayn
Oure Maunciple · I hope he wilbe ded
Swa werkes · the wanges in his hed
And therfor is I com · and eeke Alayn
To grynde oure corn · and carie it hom agayn
I pray yow spede vs hou · what ye may
It shalbe don · quod Symkyn be my fay
What wil ye don · while it is in hande
Bi god right bi the hooper wil I stande
Qud Iohn and see how the corn gas Inne
Yit sawe I neủer · bi my fader kynne
How that the hoper wagges · ta and fra
Alayn aunswerd Iohn wiltow swa
Than wil I be bineth · be my crowne
And see how the mele · fallis a doun̄
In to the trowth · that shalbe my disport
For Iohn in faith · I may be of yowre sort
I am as badde a Miller · as bien yee
